<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A pass wrapper around the ExtractLoop() scalar transformation to extract each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// top-level loop into its own new function. If the loop is the ONLY loop in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// given function, it is not touched. This is a pass most useful for debugging</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// via bugpoint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
